overview: We are used to saying: Women with glasses, Under the telescopes, The piglets. Women with glasses, Slight fixation, On hazelnuts. This film will prove that the sexual content of a woman with glasses can be ten times more intense than with a woman who does not wear them.  Like stockings or tights, glasses are a fantasy object that appeals to almost all men. All the women in this film are endowed with beautiful mounts that the stallions are sure to soil.
title: Petites garces a lunettes
